title: Slow Cooker Saucy Chicken Thighs Recipe
directions: Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper and place on a boiler pan.
Broil on high 4-5 inches from the heat 3-4 minutes on each side until lightly browned. Place in the slow cooker.
in a small bowl combine the barbeque sauce, honey, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and pepper sauce.
Pour over chicken-cover and cook 4-5 hours on low or until juices run clear. (Or internal temp. of 165F)
ingredients: ⅛ Teaspoon Hot Pepper sauce or to taste
